% XPWsettings.txt DO NOT MODIFY - autogenerated by XPWtool
% This file contains all the user defined settings

% Name data file
\define\XPWdatafile{./data/Input.txt}

% Image directory 
\define\XPWimagedir{./data/image/}

% Paper size
\define\XPWpapersize{gps1}

% Basic fontsize for publication
\define\basefontsize{9}

% Fontone is default, do not change, is also used for IPA
\define\fontoneR{CharisSIL/GR}
\define\fontoneI{CharisSIL/I}
\define\fontoneB{CharisSIL/B}
\define\fontoneBI{CharisSIL/BI}

% fonttwo - fontfive can be used if needed
\define\fonttwoR{TimesNewRomanPSMT/R}
\define\fonttwoI{TimesNewRomanPSMT/I}
\define\fonttwoB{TimesNewRomanPSMT/B}
\define\fonttwoBI{TimesNewRomanPSMT/BI}




% To switch between single of double column:
% \singlecolumn
\doublecolumn

% To get ragged right turn this mode on:
\enablemode[offalignment]




% switch between modes: dictionary or scripture
\enablemode[dictionary]
